name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
synopsis: Experience stardom on stage in this game based on the story you see on screen in Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked! Play as all six superstars from the Chipmunks and The Chipettes: Alvin, Simon, Theodore, Brittany, Jeanette, or Eleanor, and belt out 30 of their greatest hits.
